an4.84:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.84:4.3: People who value anger, or denigration, or material possessions, or honor rather than the true teaching.
an4.84:4.4: Someone with these four qualities is cast down to hell.
an4.84:5.1: Someone with four qualities is raised up to heaven.
an4.84:5.3: People who value the true teaching rather than anger, or denigration, or material possessions, or honor.
an4.84:5.4: Someone with these four qualities is raised up to heaven.”
